description: Updates of 1.1.0: * Add more categories; Display spinner when loading.  Updates of 1.0.1: * Comments on the illusion to share your amazing feelings.   It's the free version of illusion app. Buy the full version to get more amazing images and remove the ads.  The best selection of illusion wallpapers in Palm App Catalog. It provides hundreds of 320x480 pictures for you. Enjoy more illusions and amazings in the well-organized categories as follows,   * Spiral Motion   * Circle  * Lattice  * Horizontal Line  * Vertical Line  * Point  * Color  * B&W  * Others     [From Wikipedia] An illusion is a distortion of the senses, revealing how the brain normally organizes and interprets sensory stimulation. While illusions distort reality, they are generally shared by most people. Illusions may occur with more of the human senses than vision, but visual illusions, optical illusions, are the most well known and understood. The emphasis on visual illusions occurs because vision often dominates the other senses. For example, individuals watching a ventriloquist will perceive the voice is coming from the dummy since they are able to see the dummy mouth the words. Some illusions are based on general assumptions the brain makes during perception. These assumptions are made using organizational principles, like Gestalt, an individual's ability of depth perception and motion perception, and perceptual constancy. Other illusions occur because of biological sensory structures within the human body or conditions outside of the body within one's physical environment.
